page.title: 07CHARLOTTE STRAKER HOSPITAL
page.content: This is a 25 bed hospital providing care for elderly patients,some requiring continuing care,others in for a short period for rehabilitation. Day to day medical care is provided by Corbridge general practitioners.The hospital is managed from Hexham General Hospital,being part of Northumberland Health Authority.As it needs to save revenue,the Authority is considering closing the hospital and reproviding its services within Hexham hospitals.There is strong local opposition to the possible closure,led by the Parish Council.The Authority argue that the building requires high capital expenditure to bring it up to standard,the local people argue that good standards of medical and nursing care are provided.A decision will be made soon as financial pressures rise.
